title: Moisture-permeable waterproof fabric and process for production thereof.
abstract: A moisture-permeable waterproof fabric has a resin layer formed on at least one surface thereof, wherein the resin layer is composed of a mixture comprising a product obtained by reacting a urethane prepolymer having isocyanate terminals with an N-carboxyamino acid anhydride and an amine, and a polyurethane having a 100% modulus of at least 40 kg/cm<2>, the amount of the resin product in the resin layer is 12.9 to 85.3 wt% of total solid resin, and the amount of the urethane/amino acid copolymer contained in the resin layer is 0.9 to 9.0% wt of total solid resin. The fabric has both an excellent moisture permeability and waterproofness, as well as an excellent abrasion resistance and washing fastness.

motivations: Existing waterproof fabrics often lack sufficient moisture permeability, leading to discomfort and reduced performance.
There is a need for waterproof fabrics that also exhibit excellent abrasion resistance and washing fastness.
objectives: Develop a moisture-permeable waterproof fabric with improved performance characteristics.
Create a production process for the fabric that achieves the desired properties.
methods: Form a resin layer on the fabric surface using a mixture of a urethane prepolymer reaction product and a polyurethane.
Control the composition of the resin layer to achieve optimal moisture permeability, waterproofness, and durability.
results: Produce a fabric with excellent moisture permeability, waterproofness, abrasion resistance, and washing fastness.
Achieve a balance of properties that enhances the overall performance and comfort of the fabric.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of moisture-permeable waterproof fabric with improved durability

motivations: There is a need for a fabric that is both moisture-permeable and waterproof, while also being resistant to abrasion and washing.
objectives: Develop a moisture-permeable waterproof fabric with a specific resin layer composition.
Ensure the fabric has excellent moisture permeability, waterproofness, abrasion resistance, and washing fastness.
methods: Form a resin layer on at least one surface of the fabric, composed of a specific mixture obtained by reacting a urethane prepolymer with an N-carboxyamino acid anhydride and an amine, and a polyurethane.
results: The developed fabric exhibits excellent moisture permeability and waterproofness.
The fabric also shows excellent abrasion resistance and washing fastness.
openai_json.research_subject: Production of a moisture-permeable waterproof fabric with excellent abrasion resistance and washing fastness

motivations: Traditional waterproof fabrics often lack adequate moisture permeability, leading to discomfort during wear.
Existing moisture-permeable waterproof fabrics suffer from poor durability, including low abrasion resistance and washing fastness.
objectives: Develop a moisture-permeable waterproof fabric that combines excellent moisture permeability with waterproofness.
Create a fabric with enhanced durability characteristics including abrasion resistance and washing fastness.
methods: Form a resin layer on fabric surfaces using a mixture of urethane prepolymer reacted with N-carboxyamino acid anhydride and amine.
Incorporate polyurethane with specific modulus properties into the resin layer composition.
Control the proportions of resin product and urethane/amino acid copolymer within defined ranges.
results: Achieved a fabric with both excellent moisture permeability and waterproofness.
Demonstrated improved abrasion resistance and washing fastness compared to conventional waterproof fabrics.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Development of moisture-permeable waterproof fabric with enhanced durability
